description: The teddy bear that i always holds, but when i is unconscious, she moves on her own will and is given the role of protecting her from danger. In order to release i-chan from the Buggles, she stole the newly made black comcon and entrusted it to Ai Shinozaki. According to the Okamoto version of the comic, "i-chan`s guardian". When i-chan was kidnapped, it was remodeled by Dr. Inukai so that he could move at any time.
name: Kuma-chan
